summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of August 1, 2018, to August 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting the financial activities associated with the trust during that month.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 113 St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details the account balance of the Butterfly Trust as of August 31, 2018, showing an ending balance of $705,280.50.
There were outgoing transactions totaling $30,600.00 to Bank of America during the statement period.
Interest earned on the account during this period was $543.87.
The document outlines the procedures for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
The statement is marked as confidential and subject to federal rules.
